name: kj-nomad
description: Modern, offline-first, beautiful karaoke hosting software

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:production: npm run build:client && npm run copy:client && cd server && npm run start
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:server && npm run lint:fix:client
scripts.setup: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.check-all: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.iterate: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && npm run dev
scripts.release: npm run check-all && npm run package
